channel.title: Damagecounter problem(bug)
channel.description:
Hello there, i have a problem with my damage counter, I'll show a example so i can explain it better.
My oppenent has 99 hp, i hit 2 on him, the clientsided text hp shows 97/99, but at the time i hit him 2 the damage counter showed 0(that round thing on people). Now i want to fix this, does someone know how? I use Dodian MYSQL source, (Not the dodian mysql source with fixes)
Please help.
